settings.title: Calling All Mompreneurs
settings.text:

• Limited Positions Available.

settings.text:
• No Inventory Requirements.
• Customers Design On-site.
• We Ship Direct & Handle Everything.

• Promote a Brand Your Kids Love.

settings.title: Three Steps
settings.text:
• Complete Application.
• Schedule Short Interview.
• Get Started as Stylist.

settings.title: Have Fun
settings.text:
• Get paid for sharing a brand the family loves to wear.
• Have fun building a business with your kids.
• Give back to your community.

settings.title: Have Fun
settings.text:
• You're a mom: you have the skills for the job.
• Get paid for sharing a brand the whole family loves to wear.
• Have fun building a business with your kids.
• Give back to your community.

settings.main_text:
We know that moms do it all. We're committed to making it a little easier.

Fun, creative, lucrative work is possible while still putting family first.

BONUS: YOUR KIDS WILL LOVE IT!

settings.question: How does the Supermix Stylist Program work?
settings.text: Get paid for simply sharing a brand you and your kids love to wear. Supermix provides you with your own website, making it fun and easy for your customers to shop and custom design something that is 100% originally theirs. There's literally nothing else like it on the market. Supermix manages all of the inventory, orders, shipping, and more. We pay you up to 20% commission, every month, on all of your website sales, plus other Supermix bonuses.

settings.question: What is the time commitment and how much can I earn?
settings.text: Have fun and flexibility working from home, around your schedule, doing something you love. Work as much or as little as you like. Decide how much you want to earn: enough to get your kids new Supermix outfits every month, to take more frequent family vacations, or even build up a significant, part-time monthly income you can depend on. It's totally up to you.

settings.question: Does it cost anything to start?
settings.text: There is a one-time $99 start up fee for our Launch Kit to get started as a Supermix Stylist.

settings.question: What does the Stylist Launch Kit come with?
settings.text: The Supermix Stylist Kit includes 1 unlimited Design session of custom denim or sweats jacket ($99+ Value), your own personalized website ($99+ Value), a binder filled with our top Supermix patches ($99+ Value), 500 Patch Points ($60 Value), plus a 20% discount on all personal purchases. It's $400 in value for just $99 (Normally $199).

settings.question: Why partner with Supermix?
settings.text: We know that moms do it all. We're committed to making it a little easier. Supermix Founder and CEO Jennifer Stein Bischoff understands fashion trends like few others. She’s generated hundreds of millions of dollars annually in kid's apparel, at some of the world's largest retailers. Now she’s bringing her fresh perspective and unique vision to Supermix. She understands that “social selling” is where it’s at today so we’d rather pay you to help us share Supermix, than spend money on traditional advertising.

settings.question: Do I need to recruit other people?
settings.text: Recruiting is not required. Our stylists focus solely on selling and helping people design cool stuff. We provide you with training and support both online and off, to help you succeed. Supermix Studio is not an MLM.

settings.question: How many Stylist positions are available?
settings.text: We have a very limited number of Stylist positons avaiable. If your application is approved, be sure to schedule your interview right away. Once all curently available Stylist positions are filled, you will be put on our Stylist waitlist.
